Description.Text: West End Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Edinburgh. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, family room, car hire. Internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, heating, desk, telephone can be found in selected guestrooms. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Edinburgh has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at West End Hotel.
